Description: Ostracon, fragment of a drab ware pottery wine-jar, the fabric contains a number of small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a buff-coloured slip and remains of one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393523) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393523)
